name: Jungle Park
overview: Jungle Park is a mini games game that was released for PC & Playstation only in Japan. In Jungle Park, the player controls a monkey in some kind of amusement park called Jungle Park. The character just wander around the park, interacting with everything that surrounds him (just by touching it) and playing some kind of minigames. The player got freedom of movement around the park since there is no story in the game but some parts of the park won't be opened until the player makes different actions, and after that new mini games will be avaliables. To reach some places the player's character can travel using a train, balloon, canoe, etc.
